attributes.action: Get predicted grades for all exams until covid has COMPLETELY PASSED.
attributes.background: Covid 19 has been an awful and stressful enough time. All students get predicted grades until the virus is completely gone

rejection.details:
The UK Government has cancelled GCSE and A Level Exams in 2021 due to the pandemic and said that grades will be awarded using teacher assessments. We're therefore not exactly what further action you'd like to see. 

You can read the statement by the Government announcing the cancellation of exams here: https://hansard.parliament.uk/commons/2021-01-06/debates/D2A64DD9-6A6B-4EAB-8001-C3BACDE25B02/Covid-19EducationalSettings

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like to happen. 

If you're concerned about vocational exams, you may wish to sign this petition: 

Allow teacher predicted grades for BTEC students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548778
